bibl.title: Caligulan Month-Names at Philadelphia and Related Matters.
bibl.note: L'article comporte l'édition de P. Lond. Inv. 2248 recto, iii, 34-53; de P. Mich. Inv. 876 recto, i, 17-20 et verso, i, 10-16.

bibl.title: Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Lond. Inv. 2248 recto P. Mich. Inv. 876
Hanson Ann Ellis, Caligulan Month-Names at Philadelphia and Related Matters.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 1107-1118, 1 pl.
L'article comporte l'édition de P. Lond. Inv. 2248 recto, iii, 34-53; de P. Mich. Inv. 876 recto, i, 17-20 et verso, i, 10-16.
